section.title: Wilson A2K

listitem: Select Styles Integrated with SuperSkin™ Leather

section.paragraph: Wilson’s most premium glove, the A2K is carefully hand shaped and crafted with the finest cuts of leather to break in without breaking down. A triple sorting process ensures each glove is made with the top 5% of Pro Stock hides. A2K gloves also feature a Double Palm Construction and Rolled Dual Welting™ for maximum stability and shape retention. Select A2K styles are integrated with exclusive SuperSkin™ leather, which is twice as strong as cowhide at only half the weight.

section.title: Wilson A2000

listitem: Select Styles Integrated with SuperSkin™ Leather

section.paragraph: Chosen for its durable materials and solid break-in time, A2000 gloves boast top-level consistency with pro-inspired patterns. Designed with American Pro Stock steerhide leather, breathable Dri-Lex wrist lining and Dual Welting™, each glove provides quality support and comfort to give you the upper hand on the field. Select A2000 styles are integrated with exclusive SuperSkin™ leather, which is twice as strong as cowhide at only half the weight.

section.title: Rawlings Heart of the Hide
section.paragraph: Rawlings Heart of the Hide serves as the foundation for advanced player performance while delivering a shorter break-in period. Each HOH glove is carefully constructed from the top 5% of hides available and integrates full-grain fingerback linings for a premium feel.

section.title: Rawlings Pro Preferred®
section.paragraph: The signature Kip-leather look and feel of Rawlings Pro Preferred gloves place them in the upper level of fielding performance. These gloves are designed with professional patterns used by the game’s finest and feature Pittards sheepskin palm lining and 100% wool padding to maximize comfort.

section.title: Rawlings Gold Glove

listitem: Meticulously Assembled by a Single Craftsman

section.paragraph: Setting the bar for Rawlings pro series gloves, the Gold Glove represents more than 100 years of superior craftsmanship. Every Gold Glove is meticulously cut, assembled and sewn, start to finish, by a single craftsman and includes an individual serial number with the maker, date created and production number. Gold Gloves are made with top-of-the-line European leather, famous for its supple feel and durable finish. The calfskin palm lining helps reduce moisture during play.

section.title: Mizuno Pro™ Series

listitem: Limited Edition, Pro & Pro Select Styles
Finest Quality Materials, Handcrafted for Excellence
Designs & Pockets Tailored for Every Position

section.paragraph: The Mizuno Pro series features the highest quality leather and raw materials from around the globe. Designed by master craftsman, the Pro series is available in three designs. Pro Series Limited Edition gloves feature the finest cuts of European leather and are handcrafted in Haga, Japan. Regarded as the finest ball glove leather available, each LE glove comes with a manufacturer reconditioning program that offers a one-time opportunity to restore it to its original condition. Pro Series gloves are handcrafted with a perfectly preformed pocket based on the needs of each position. They are designed with US Kip leather that offers a soft, firm feel that holds up at the highest levels of play. Pro Select Series gloves are made with US Steerhide leather for a firm, durable feel that forms to the hand once broken in.

section.title: Nokona Classic Walnut™
section.paragraph: Nokona is applauded for its quality and revered for its long-standing heritage. Classic Walnut gloves undergo the same handcrafting process that has kept this brand at the top of the game for more than 80 years. Proudly American made, each glove features top-grain steerhide leather and is individually cut, stamped, stitched, laced and embroidered for a truly unique experience on the field.
